title: London Jazz Platform
bodyMain:
Fi’s recently performed at the London Jazz Platform event at London Fields. It was an amazing event and Fi was so honoured to be part of it. Audience response was amazing:

  • "Stunning set, especially the high A you got – incredible" - Sammy Stein

  • "You are an exceptional singer/pianist" - Marco Marconi

  • "Love your music" - Meridian FM Jazz

  • ‘We wanted to hear more!!!’ - Group of people in the audience (!)

title: Fiona Ross Letter To Passionate Kids
bodyMain:
Fi was extremely honoured and humbled to be asked to be involved in this wonderful website that works to inspire young people realise their dreams and stay motivated. They do this initially by interviewing engineers, scientists and musicians and they also support and encourage more girls to get involved in engineering. Fi is referred to as 'London's Royalty of Jazz'. Here is the first published article from Fi.

http://www.instantwebsetup.com/en/successskunks/Fiona_Ross_Letter_to_Passionate_Kids_p4837.html

title: London Jazz Platform
bodyMain:
Very excited to announce that Fi will be doing a set at the London Jazz Platform event on June 18th. The line up is amazing and Fi is thrilled to be included.

http://jazzineurope.mfmmedia.nl/2017/05/the-london-jazz-platform-is-a-new-event-for-london/

bodyMain:
RKC: Radio Kaos Caribou: https://www.facebook.com/RadioKC/?rc=p

bodyMain:
Everyone had an amazing night at Fi’s gig at Nells Blues and Jazz: http://www.nellsjazzandblues.com

Here’s a couple of shots from the night

title: The new album is getting some serious radio play since the release
bodyMain:
You can hear both of Fi’s album here:

artdistrict-radio.com

jazzbitesradio.com

time1075.net (from May 9th)

title: Jazz Voices
bodyMain: Fi has now been included on jazzvoices.org/gallery which features 'Premier Jazz vocalists'. She is truly humbled to be included on the same page as one of her heroes Dee Dee Bridgewater.

title: Featured on the Daily Express
bodyMain: "Meet the jazz artist who gave Ed Sheeran his 'first push' into music... " Full article

title: Fiona was interviewed live on air at Quest 915 FM talking about the new album.
bodyMain:
Presenter Atsenuwa Omatseye said 'Fiona showed up, spoke....laughed and lit up the jazzville show and was truly 'FIOMINAL'

http://www.questfm.com.ng

title: First gig date in London released for Fiona
bodyMain: May 6th – Hope to see lots of you there!

title: Nate Williams touring
bodyMain: Were very excited to announce that Nate Williams who we are thrilled played Bass and mixed the new album, has just announced he will be touring with Jamiroquai!!

title: New Behind the scenes video released
I Don’t Want To Play
bodyMain: Final shoot for the video for ‘I Don’t Want To Play’ has now taken place and the video is being editing ready for release on April 7th. With a shoot in Spain and two in London, we are all very excited to see the final product! Hope you do too! Remember to subscribe to the new YouTube channel, so you can see it first!!
